HellÃƒÂ¸ fellow Kerbaloids,

I want to share a Spotify playlist that I often listen to while playing KSP. Its a great mix of electronic ambient and instrumental music. Check it out: http://open.spotify.com/user/keatshandwriting/playlist/21J20PgNUj49fSp2UOfawo

Got any good suggestions yourself? I'd love to hear them!

Thanks !

Found this all this time later while googling ksp Spotify playlist, and low and behold.

Will follow =)
Funk for flyin'
A necro of a post 3 YEARS OLD!!??
Oh wow, haha. Well, it remains relevant!
I love classic music most of the time.
How about Russian guys? Like a : Artek elektronika, 7OnOff(semenov)?

Well, I tend to like sites that don't require me to sign in prior to me listening, iTunes is an exception.  I will listen to almost every kind of music genre and I like variety.  My mood guides my preferences of the moment.

I've shared the playlist on this site before, but it remains fitting since its music performed (not written) by a real space scientist.

http://www.themarathonmusic.com

Just use the player!
